layerNames.description: The names of the layers in the web map. The app uses these to get references to the layers for filtering and toggling. The keys for this object are used in the app code so they should not be changed.

webMapId.description: The AGOL id of the web map that you want to point the app to.

defaultValue.value:
This web map depicts known existing bicycle paths, lanes, and paths. An alternate map view conveys a comparative level of traffic stress (LTS, how is LTS calculated opens in a new window ) that users might experience when bicycling along major roadways.

This dataset is updated periodically but users are advised that the map may not reflect current conditions on the ground, and may contain errors or omissions. User can click on any location on the map to indicate where updated data is needed.

Use of this information is at your own risk.

Planned bike features can be found in this map opens in a new window .

aboutContent.description: The html content displayed in the about/loading dialog.

hybridId.description: The AGOL Item id for the hybrid (imagery + overlay) base map.

fieldNames.description: Field names for any of the layers. The keys for this object are used in the app code so they should not be changed.

classOrder.description: Controls the display order of renderer classes in the filter. If unspecified, the default renderer order is used. The keys should not be changed. Values are arrays of indexes corresponding to renderer classes.
